reviews.review_text: The restaurant/ is situated just off the Palolem beach road,. It's a small quiet place to enjoy a meal. You can visit here to have a basic seafood thali. They have some other regular items on the menu as well. Service is a bit slow and ambience is average, prices are reasonable.

The place itself is very good. There is an ample amount of seating available on any given day but I would recommend this place during the wee hours as they have chefs available at that point of time. In between times such as 3 PM or something which is neither lunch nor tea, one will find most of the foods and dishes not available as they are preparing for something larger and that is dinner. All in all, I would recommend this place if you are visiting Palolem.

Probably the best prawns I have ever eaten. The waiter Pradeep was so humble, serving us quickly and even taking the time to chat and ask if we were enjoying our time in Goa. He also offered suggestions for places to visit.

100% recommended
